p.span: Welcome to Florence County School District Five! Our district has a rich tradition of excellence in every aspect of education and extra-curricular activities. We strive daily to reach new and enduring levels of excellence. Along with the significant progress that has been made due to the commitment of our stakeholders, our quest and commitment for providing quality college and career readiness educational opportunities for students continues. Every day, Florence County School District Five is on a journey of academic excellence that is taken seriously.
